title: Instructional Design Strategies for the Purpose and Value of Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learner role: students/job seekers; delivery method: mobile-based microlearning; assessment: formative assessment-centered

learning_goals: Explain at least three intrinsic purposes and values of higher education
Analyze and explain the interconnectedness of scientific research methodologies and instructional design
Apply two instructional strategies for efficient learning design in mobile environments
Revise and enhance personal learning plans based on formative assessment results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
